TRIGGER: return TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_INSTANT ) or TriggerObject():GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_SORCERY )
FILTER: local filter = ClearFilter() filter:SetFilterType( FILTER_TYPE_PLAYERS ) filter:Add( FE_TEAM, OP_NOT, EffectController():GetTeam() )
RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: if (FilteredPlayer() ~= nil) then EffectSourceLKI():DealDamageTo( 2, FilteredPlayer() ) elseif (FilteredCard() ~= nil) then EffectSourceLKI():DealDamageTo( 2, FilteredCard() ) end
